author: Brian Wang
title: Denmark, Norway, Austria, Czech Republic Are Carefully Lifting Coronavirus Restrictions
description: From Wednesday, Denmark children aged 11 and younger will return to schools and nurseries, after a month of closures. Denmark, Norway, Czech Republic and Austria are the first European countries that... [[ This is a content summary only. Visit my website for …
content:
From Wednesday, Denmark children aged 11 and younger will return to schools and nurseries, after a month of closures. Denmark, Norway, Czech Republic and Austria are the first European countries that are slowly lifting lockdown.
They are re-opening some stor… [+2496 chars]
